comments.author: goofy.bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b9pre) Gecko/20110101 Firefox/4.0b9pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:2.0b8pre) Gecko/20101116 Thunderbird/3.3a1

summary is self-explicit I think.
I also made a test with other accesskeys for French on localized version but they do not work (none of the letters in French "Anniversaire" was active, though underlined as expected)

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new contact or edit a contact
2. Click on the "Private" tab
3. press Alt+B to reach the Birtday field
Actual Results:  
No effect

Expected Results:  
Cursor should position in Birthday field

I also made a test with other accesskeys for French on localized version but they do not work (none of the letters in French "Anniversaire" was active, though underlined as expected)

Yeah, still not working. But the label has the proper control="Birthday" attribute (https://hg.mozilla.org/comm-central/file/94a6184a5646/mail/components/addrbook/content/abCardOverlay.xul#l245). Maybe a toolkit bug?
